description: ESLint configuration script for a Next.js project using '@eslint/eslintrc' and 'flat-compat' to extend Next.js recommended ESLint configurations.

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Defines __dirname as the directory name of the current file

methods.name: compat
methods.description: Instance of FlatCompat used to extend ESLint configurations

methods.name: eslintConfig
methods.description: Array of extended ESLint configurations based on Next.js recommended settings
